q: ''I just try to deny him the ball as much as possible, because when he does get the ball, the best penetrator in the game is going to be hard to stop,'' Tyronn Lue said. PROPOSED HIKES Business at Plattsburgh International Airport has boomed since it opened in 2007, as thousands of Canadians have taken advantage of direct flights to Florida, South Carolina and the Caribbean.

Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer should probably stay in place. I bring this up because my eWeek colleague, Don Reisinger, just published an article titled, Steve Ballmer 's CES Performance Proves He Needs to Go. Among the reasons: Microsoft's failure to craft a sizable tablet response to the Apple iPad, Steve Ballmer 's supposedly misplaced faith in Windows Phone 7's market prospects and little progress in reversing Google's search-engine dominance
